languages.text: "Это — мои оптиматы. Святые, которые поведут за собой паству в предначертанный час. Прислушайся..." {n}Мужчина делает паузу и улыбается.{/n} "Слышишь? Нет? Они кричат. Зовут. Просто их крики — не для наших ушей. Они уходят туда, за грань стекла, в прозрачную тишь. Там их слышат. Там на этот зов отвечают".

"These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."
languages.original_text: "Это — мои оптиматы. Святые, которые поведут за собой паству в предначертанный час. Прислушайся..." {n}Мужчина делает паузу и улыбается.{/n} "Слышишь? Нет? Они кричат. Зовут. Просто их крики — не для наших ушей. Они уходят туда, за грань стекла, в прозрачную тишь. Там их слышат. Там на этот зов отвечают".

It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the brink of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the brink of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

"These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

languages.text: “他们是我的善男信女，将在宿命到来的时刻指引牧群。听啊……”{n}他顿了顿，微笑着说道。{/n}“你们能听到吗？听不到，是吧？他们在呼喊，在呼唤。不过，他们的呼唤并不是为我们的耳朵准备的。他们的声音投向远方，投向玻璃的边缘之外，投向透明的寂静之中。在那里，他们的声音得到了聆听；在那里，他们的呼唤得到了回应。”
languages.original_text: "These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

traits.locale_text: “他们是我的善男信女，将在宿命到来的时刻指引牧群。听啊……”{n}他顿了顿，微笑着说道。{/n}“你们能听到吗？听不到，是吧？他们在呼喊，在呼唤。不过，他们的呼唤并不是为我们的耳朵准备的。他们的声音投向远方，投向玻璃的边缘之外，投向透明的寂静之中。在那里，他们的声音得到了聆听；在那里，他们的呼唤得到了回应。”

languages.text: 「彼らは我がオプティメイトたちなのだ。運命の時、あまねく群れを導く聖人なのだよ。聞くがいい…」{n}彼は一旦黙り、微笑んだ。{/n}「聞こえるか？聞こえないのか？彼らは叫んでいる。そう、叫んでいるのだ。その叫びは我らの耳に届くものではない。彼らはガラスの淵をこえ、透明な静寂のなかへと声をなげかけているのだ。そこで、彼らの声が聞こえる。そこで、彼らの叫びは応えを得るのだ」
languages.original_text: "These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは我がオプティマテスなのだ。運命の時、あまねく群れを導く聖者なのだよ。聞くがいい…」{n}彼は立ち止まり、微笑んだ。{/n}「聞こえぬか？聞こえないのか？彼らは叫んでいれうのだ。そう、叫んでいる。その叫びは我らの耳に届くものではない。彼らはガラスの淵をこえ、透明な静寂のなかへと声をなげかけているのだ。そこで彼らの声が聞こえる。そこで、彼らの叫びは応えを得るのだ」
「彼らは我がオプティメイトたちなのだ。運命の時、あまねく群れを導く聖人なのだよ。聞くがいい…」{n}彼は一旦黙り、微笑んだ。{/n}「聞こえるか？聞こえないのか？彼らは叫んでいる。そう、叫んでいるのだ。その叫びは我らの耳に届くものではない。彼らはガラスの淵をこえ、透明な静寂のなかへと声をなげかけているのだ。そこで、彼らの声が聞こえる。そこで、彼らの叫びは応えを得るのだ」

languages.text: "Das sind meine Optimaten. Heilige, die die Herde in der Stunde des Schicksals führen werden. Hört zu ..." {n}Er hält inne und lächelt.{/n} "Hört Ihr das? Nein? Sie schreien. Sie rufen. Aber ihre Rufe sind nicht für unsere Ohren bestimmt. Ihre Stimmen greifen jenseits des Glases, in die durchsichtige Stille. Dort werden sie gehört. Dort erhält ihr Ruf eine Antwort."
languages.original_text: "These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind meine Optimaten. Heilige, die die Herde in der Stunde des Schicksals führen werden. Hört zu ..." {n}Er hält inne und lächelt.{/n} "Hört Ihr das? Nein? Sie schreien. Sie rufen. Aber ihre Rufe sind nicht für unsere Ohren bestimmt. Ihre Stimmen greifen jenseits des Glases, in die durchsichtige Stille. Dort werden sie gehört. Dort erhält ihr Ruf eine Antwort."

languages.text: « Ceux-là sont mes élus. Les saints qui guideront les ouailles lorsque l'heure sera venue. Écoutez... » {n}Il marque une pause, puis sourit.{/n} « Vous entendez ? Non ? Ils hurlent. Ils appellent. Mais leurs cris ne nous sont pas destinés. C'est au-delà du voile de verre, dans le silence absolu, que leurs voix résonnent. Là-bas, ils sont écoutés. Là-bas, leur appel est entendu. »
languages.original_text: "These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux-là sont mes élus. Les saints qui guideront les ouailles lorsque l'heure sera venue. Écoutez... » {n}Il marque une pause, puis sourit.{/n} « Vous entendez ? Non ? Ils hurlent. Ils appellent. Mais leurs cris ne nous sont pas destinés. C'est au-delà du voile de verre, dans le silence absolu, que leurs voix résonnent. Là-bas, ils sont écoutés. Là-bas, leur appel est entendu. »

languages.text: «Estos son mis optimates: los santos que guiarán al rebaño en el momento predestinado. Escucha...». {n}Hace una pausa y sonríe.{/n} «¿Los oyes? ¿No? Están rogando. Llamando. Pero no a nosotros. Envían sus voces más allá, al otro lado del cristal a la calma transparente. Allí les escuchan. Allí responden a su llamada».
languages.original_text: "These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

traits.locale_text: «Estos son mis optimates: los santos que guiarán al rebaño en el momento predestinado. Escucha...». {n}Hace una pausa y sonríe.{/n} «¿Los oyes? ¿No? Están rogando. Llamando. Pero no a nosotros. Envían sus voces más allá, al otro lado del cristal a la calma transparente. Allí les escuchan. Allí responden a su llamada».

languages.text: "Bunlar benim optimatelerim, kader saati geldiğinde sürüye rehberlik edecek azizler. Dinle..." {n}Duraklayıp gülümsüyor.{/n} "Duyabiliyor musun? Hayır mı? Haykırıyorlar, çağırıyorlar. Çığlıklarını kulaklarımız duymuyor, o kadar. Sesleri dışarıda, camın kenarının ötesinde, şeffaf sessizlikte yankılanıyor. İşte orada duyuluyorlar, orada çağrılarına cevap alıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "These are my optimates. Saints who will guide the flock at the fated hour. Listen..." {n}He pauses and smiles.{/n} "Can you hear? You can't? They are crying out. Calling. It's just that their cries are not meant for our ears. They cast their voices out there, beyond the edge of the glass, into the transparent quiet. There, they are heard. There, their call is answered."

Haykırıyorlar, çağırıyorlar. Çığlıklarını kulaklarımız duymuyor, o kadar. Sesleri dışarıda, camın kenarının ötesinde, şeffaf sessizlikte yankılanıyor. İşte orada duyuluyorlar, orada çağrılarına cevap alıyorlar."
